headline: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) To Install 76 Elevators At Luxury Riverside Crescent Project In Dubai
summary: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) is set to enhance luxury living in Dubai through its latest partnership with Sobha Realty, involving the installation of advanced elevators at the Riverside Crescent project. Although this commitment exemplifies innovation and expansion, the company's stock experienced a price move of 3% lower over the past week. This decline aligns with the broader market downturn, where general market indices saw a comparable 3% drop. This suggests that while the Riverside Crescent...

headline: Otis and Sobha Realty Continue to Elevate Luxury Living in Dubai
summary: Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS), the world's leading elevator and escalator manufacturing, installation and service company, will provide and install 76 elevators at the Riverside Crescent project by Sobha Realty - a leading global luxury real estate developer.

content.title: Otis and Sobha Realty Continue to Elevate Luxury Living in Dubai
content.summary: Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS), the world's leading elevator and escalator manufacturing, installation and service company, will provide and install 76 elevators at the Riverside Crescent project by Sobha Realty - a leading global luxury real estate developer.

thumbnail.caption: From left: Suraj Gopinathan, Assistant Vice President Senior Manager, Sobha Realty; Diwakar Kheterpal, Director Group Procurement Sobha Realty; Ehtesham Ahmed, Otis Middle East (ME) Sales & Marketing Dir.; Mohammed Al Qaisi, Otis ME Leader; Varughese Mathew, Chief Operating Officer, Sobha Realty; Jo√£o Penedo, Otis Senior VP for Iberia, Africa & Middle East (IBAME); Javier Barquin, Otis Field Lead; Ramon Sendra, Otis Sales Lead; Mohamed Haidara, Otis UAE Sr Sales Mgr; Alphin Aloor, Otis Analytics
